summary:
Hello everyone! 
The mods of BoysBoysBoys would like to inform everyone that we will have to replace the BakuDeku sticker...
body:
Zine Update

Hello everyone!

The mods of BoysBoysBoys would like to inform everyone that we will have to replace the BakuDeku sticker advertised in our preorder graphics because the contributor who created the sticker is no longer apart of the zine.

Because of this, we will be replacing the sticker with the stretch goal! We hope you all understand, please let us know what you think! If you have ordered a bundle with the previous sticker included, we will be emailing you to ask if you’d like to have the sticker by our head mod, @orkachii displayed below.

Thank you!

- Mods of BoysBoysBoys

tags: bring me older aizawa whispering sweet nothings in mics ear
tell me about how aizawa is abrasive towards everyone except mic
title: Request Wednesday: Ribs
body:
(he/him afab) Aizawa x (he/him atm genderfluid) Present Mic

+++

When Hizashi threw his back out he laid on the floor of his classroom for a full hour until his class started filing in. Sweet Kirishima tried to help him up but the pain was too much and he ended up flopping right back to the ground and asking for Shouta. His cheeks went red when Sho brought Toshi and instructed him to take the class for a field trip so Sho could deal with his broken and curled up body.

“How’s it goin down there?” Shouta didn’t physically smirk but Hizashi could feel it in his tone anyway.

“I’m getting old, Sho,” he groaned into the dirty tile floor, shifting in his pain.

“It happens,” he nearly giggled.

They managed to get him upright, if not fully hunched over still, but it was progress.

Shouta sat crisscrossed next to him and held an ice pack to his lower back while brushing his long hair from his eyes and whispering sweet words in his ear.

“I swear we were doing shots and dancing on Pride floats not but a year ago,” he whined into Shouta’s neck.

Shouta’s response was a gentle press of lips to his temple and a trail of kisses down his jaw.

“Feels like yesterday when you screamed your pronouns in my face and threw up in the bush,” Shouta actually laughed this time making Hizashi’s whine squeal higher.

“In my defense,” Hizashi groaned, “I was young and in love.”

“In your defense,” Shouta laughed, “I am old and in love.”

summary: HEY! Your tododeku art is amazing!!! Your amazing!!!! I love your art and I hope that you never forget how amazing you are!!!!
question: HEY! Your tododeku art is amazing!!! Your amazing!!!! I love your art and I hope that you never forget how amazing you are!!!!
answer:
omg thank you so much anon for your kind kind words!

It really makes me happy to see that there are people out there who enjoy my art. I’m always wanting to contribute to the tododeku fanbase so thank you for looking at it!

I just need to remind myself how lucky i am and humble myself back to earth. Because there are people out there who aren’t as lucky as I am.

I was just reading a fanfic recently but the author had quickly left the fandom due to the toxicity that could happen within the bnha community. It’s so very unfortunate that the author had to go through a hard time with the fanbase and I just need to remind myself that (so far) I’ve had it easy.

So thank you again, for being so kind to take the time to say that. It really means a lot to me!

So thank you again, for being so kind to take the time to say that. It really means a lot to me!

blog.name: bakugou-loving-hours
blog.title: Are Always Open
blog.description: The name's Rev. I'm 23, nb or genderfluid, queer, she/her/they/them mostly. Bakugou is my boy! Follow back from Pink-hair-revolution.

title: Request Wednesday: First
body:
(they/them nb) Bakugou x (he/him afab) Kirishima

+++

Kirishima got his first period when he was in class. He stood to answer a question and felt Bakugou roughly tug him back down into his seat. He almost cried when the other students laughed at him. Actually cried when Bakugou wrapped their jacket around his waist and directed him to the bathroom.

“Y-you-” Kirishima couldn’t get the words out with the fat tears streaming down his face.

“Sorry about pullin’ on you,” Bakugou wiped Kirishima’s face with a gentle hand. “I thought you wouldn’t want people to see.”

Bakugou didn’t hold it against him when the tears got thicker and his hands began to shake. Didn’t bring it up later on when Kirishima brought back the jacket, washed and stain free. They were unusually graceful and sweet for the next week, but didn’t treat him like a fragile little flower. Instead they picked him for their dodgeball team and their partner in the relay race.

Kirishima got his first crush that same day in class. Realized Bakugou was abrasive and mean, but never to him. Loved the feeling of butterflies in his stomach and heat in his cheeks when Bakugou got close.

When they made it to high school, Kirishima had mastered the art of crush denial with the help of free weights and kickboxing. He attributed the heat in his cheeks to over exertion and the butterflies as a need for more protein. It didn’t matter if it only happened around Bakugou, he wasn’t in love with his best friend.

Bakugou realized their first crush when they saw Kirishima knock his sensei on his ass.
